byline.contributor: Lenzy Krehbiel-Burton reported from Tulsa, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York.
byline.original: By LENZY KREHBIEL-BURTON and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

abstract: Grand jury indicts Tulsa County, Okla, Sheriff Stanley Glanz for misconduct related to accidental shooting of Eric C Harris by volunteer reserve deputy Robert C Bates; Glanz will step down; Bates is friend of Glanz, and critics say Glanz violated rules by allowing Bates to act unsupervised as he was unqualified.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Sheriff Stanley Glanz said that he would step down, six months after a volunteer deputy accidentally killed an unarmed man during an arrest.

headline.main: Tulsa Sheriff to Resign Over Killing by Deputy
headline.print_headline: Tulsa Sheriff to Resign Over Killing by Deputy

snippet: A lawyer for Sheriff Stanley Glanz said that he would step down, six months after a volunteer deputy accidentally killed an unarmed man during an arrest.
